>

> 
> Then new body segment 1 at P0 (old head position)
> 
> New body segment 2 at P1 (old position of seg1)
> 
> ...
> 
> New body segment k at P_{k-1} (old position of seg k-1)
> 
> And new tail segment at Pk (old tail position, not moved)
> 
> So the snake has one more segment.
